subject: Attention ;Beneficiary.
body:
Attention ;Beneficiary.
                                    FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION.
We believe that this notification meets you in a very good present state of mind and health. We the Federal bureau of investigation (FBI)  in conjunction with some other relevant Investigation Agencies here in the United States of America have recently been informed through our Global intelligence monitoring network that you presently have a transaction of five million dollars going on,  as regards to your overdue  payment of Inheritance Fund Originated from  England  which was fully endorsed in your favor accordingly.
It might interest you to know that we have taken out time in screening through this project as stipulated on our protocol of operation and have finally confirmed that your payment is 100% genuine and hitch free from all facets and of which you have the lawful right to claim your fund without any further delay. Having said all this, we will further advise that you go ahead in dealing with  Prof.Francis Bill of United Nations- debt settlement commission in regard to this payment as your payment  is presently in their possession  , You can contact him via this email address; 
proffrancisbill@gmail.com
,  Who is presently in charge of all payment as we will be monitoring all their services with you as well as your correspondence at all levels.
They further informed us that we should warn our dear citizens who must have been informed of their payment which was awarded to them, to be very careful prior to these irregularities so that they don't fall victim to the ugly circumstance.
NOTE: In your best interest, You are hereby advised to stop further communication with any persons or group of people claiming to be in possession of your payment and contact Prof. Francis Bill  of United Nations- debt settlement commission  now ;proffrancisbill@gmail.com.   
 Please act timely.
BEST REGARDS
Peter Koman.
FOR  FBI,
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION.

subject: Re:   Attention ;Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Peter Koman,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I must say, your email has caught my attention. It's interesting to hear that the Federal Bureau of Investigation and other relevant agencies have been monitoring my payment of five million dollars from England.

Could you please provide me with more details about this payment? How did I become eligible for such a large sum of money? And why is it being held by the United Debt Settlement Commission?

I appreciate your assistance in clarifying these matters. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Darin

subject: Re: Attention ;Beneficiary.
body:
*Attn; Darin.*

*Re. Notice of funds payment {$5} due to you*

*Sir*

*Thank for your email,*

*I notice that you were directed to contact me by Mr.* *Peter Koman of the
(f.b.i) in regards to your five million dollars payment. Please send me
your address, cell phone number and your id card let's proceed with your
payment. *

*Thanks for your anticipated cooperation.*

*Prof, Francis Bill*

subject: Re: Attention ;Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Prof. Francis Bill,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the notice of funds payment. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. However, before proceeding further, I would like to clarify a few things.

Could you please provide more details about the payment? Specifically, what is the source of these funds and why am I entitled to receive five million dollars? It would be helpful if you could share any relevant documents or information that can verify the legitimacy of this transaction.

Additionally, I'm curious to know how Mr. Peter Koman is involved in all of this. Could you please explain his role and how he came to direct me to contact you?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Darin

subject: Re: Attention ;Beneficiary.
body:

Additionally, I'm curious to know how Mr. Peter Koman is involved in this process. Could you please elaborate on his role and why he directed me to contact you?

I look forward to your response.

subject: Re: Attention ;Beneficiary.
body:
*Attn; Darin.*

*Re. Notice of funds payment {$5} due to you*

*Sir*

*Thank for your email,*

*The five million dollars is a United Nations grant, Yes, there will be
documentation on the payment. In regard to Mr. Peter Koman, They were
directed to investigate and approve the authentication of this transaction.
*



*Thanks for your anticipated cooperation.*

*Prof, Francis Bill*

subject: Re: Attention ;Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Prof. Francis Bill,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the notice of funds payment. I appreciate your response and would like to learn more about this United Nations grant.

Could you please provide me with some additional details about how this grant works? How was I selected to receive it? And what are the steps involved in receiving the funds?

Also, could you clarify who Mr. Peter Koman is and his role in this process? It would be helpful to understand his involvement.

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Darin

subject: Regarding your payment
body:
*Attn;Jake.*

*Re. Notice of funds payment {$5} due to you*

*Sir*

*The Sum of five million United States dollars ($5 Million) only has been
approved to be paid to you as the authentic beneficiary. Be informed that
your  payment  will be made through  our correspondent  bank  Via  online
banking system.*

*Your payment process will commence as soon as we receive your response and
your identity verified. Will shall process your payment document for free
but might be require to pay some little fee at the bank *

*Thanks for your anticipated cooperation.*

*Yours faithfully ,*

*Prof, Francis Bill*

*United Nations Committee on Financial and Allied Matters*



Hello Prof. Francis Bill,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the legal resolution and release
of overdue payments. I appreciate the information you have provided.

I would like to know more about the process of releasing my payment. Could
you please explain how the Approved Payment Channels work?

Also, I would like to confirm if there are any fees or charges associated
with the release of my payment. It would be helpful to have a clear
understanding of any financial obligations on my part.

Looking forward to your response.
Best wishes,
Jake

subject: Re: Attention ;Beneficiary.
body:
*Attn; Darin.*

*Re. Notice of funds payment {$5} due to you*

*Sir*

*Thank for your email,*

*After the payment paperwork, I will direct you to contact a bank in Spain,
They will ask you to open a zero online account with them, After that, the
five million dollars will be credited into your already opened account. You
can be in your comfort zone in your country and make withdrawal from the
same account without going to Spain.  *

*Thanks for your anticipated cooperation.*

*Prof, Francis Bill*

>

subject: Re: Regarding your payment
body:
Dear Jake,

Thank you for your response. I am glad to hear that you are interested in the process of releasing your payment. The Approved Payment Channels refer to the authorized methods through which your funds will be transferred to you securely.

To initiate the payment process, we will require some information from you, such as your full name, contact address, phone number, and a valid identification document. This is necessary for verification purposes and to ensure that the funds are being released to the rightful recipient.

Regarding fees or charges, please note that there might be some minimal administrative fees associated with the transfer process. However, rest assured that these fees will be deducted from the total amount due to you and not required upfront. We prioritize transparency in our transactions and will provide you with a breakdown of any applicable charges before proceeding.

Once we receive your complete information and verify your identity, we will prepare the necessary payment documents and guide you through the remaining steps. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.

Best regards,
Prof.

Best wishes,
Jake

subject: Re: Attention ;Beneficiary.
body:
Hello! How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Darin

subject: Re: Attention ;Beneficiary.
body:

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the notice of funds payment. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. Could you please provide me with more details about the payment paperwork? What exactly do I need to do and what information will be required?

Additionally, could you clarify why I would need to open a zero online account with a bank in Spain? Is there a specific reason for this requirement? How secure is this process?

Thank you once again for your help.

Best wishes,
Darin

*The first step is for you to send your address, cell phone number and your
id card. Second step is for us to do the paperwork  for the payment, After
that, all the paperwork will be forwarded to the paying bank. I will then
send you the paying bank contact for you to contact them. *

*Thanks for your anticipated cooperation.*

*Prof, Francis Bill*
